title.en: Three Prayers from the Earth Pig Year

text.en: Infinite blessed deities, peaceful and wrathful, turn your attention towards me, I pray!
text.en-trans: chomden zhitro rabjam gong su sol

text.en: Since we are connected through your great wisdom and compassion,
May all the impairments and breakages of samaya that I and others have committed
text.en-trans: dak sok damtsik nyamchak tamché kün

text.en: Be purified through the power of your great sacred pledge.
text.en-trans: tukdam chenpö wang gi dakpar dzö

text.en: Ho! Youthful Mañjuśrī, the body of self-arisen original wisdom,
text.en-trans: ho, jampal zhönnu rangjung yeshe ku

text.en: Dwelling inseparably within my heart—through radiating rays of light,
text.en-trans: nying la yermé zhukpé özer gyi

text.en: Cause all the darkness of deluded perception within saṃsāra
To be cleared away in the basic space of equality and great bliss.
text.en-trans: nyamnyi dechen ying su dakpar dzö

text.en: Ho!  Vidyādhara gurus of the three lineages with your compassion,
text.en-trans: ho, gyü sum rigdzin lama tukjé chen

text.en: Infinite peaceful and wrathful yidam deities with your blessings,
Ḍākas and ḍākinīs of the three places with your power and strength,
text.en-trans: né sum pawo khandro tutsal chen

text.en: Protectors, dharmapālas and guardian deities with your scared pledges,
All of you, please turn your attention towards me, I pray!
text.en-trans: malü tamché dak la gong su sol

text.en: With a mind that is tormented by weariness and sorrow, I beg you:
text.en-trans: nyamtak dungwé yi kyi solwa deb

text.en: Do not forget your sacred pledge, but gaze upon me at once with your compassion,
text.en-trans: tukdam ma yel tukjé nyurdu zik

text.en: Grant me your blessings, and bestow the supreme and ordinary accomplishments!
text.en-trans: jingyi lob shik choktün ngödrub tsol
